title: Nominations Sent to the Senate 08/06/2009 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




August 06, 2009

 



Nominations Sent to the Senate 08/06/2009




THE WHITE HOUSE     Office of the Press Secretary  __________________________________________________________________________    For Immediate Release                                                         August 6, 2009      NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE: Frank Kendall III, of Virginia, to be Deputy Under Secretary of Defense for Acquisition and Technology, vice James I. Finley, resigned. David Morris Michaels, of Maryland, to be an Assistant Secretary of Labor, vice Edwin G. Foulke, Jr. # # #
